title: Music and Production Team
description: Join us in worshiping the Lord on stage with your musical talents. Apply today and join an enthusiastic group devoted to excellence, worship, and service.

title: Media and Creatives Team
description: We are looking for people who are skilled in photography, camera operation, clicker mastery, OBS, and can manage social media using Photoshop and video editing. If you have the desire to use your talents to contribute to the church's mission, we encourage you to apply and become a valuable member of our growing team.

title: Usher Team
description: Serve the Lord by greeting visitors with a warm smile.

title: Security Team
description: Join our team and help maintain the peace of our church community.

title: Medical Team
description: If you're interested in providing your medical expertise to help those in need, make a significant contribution with us today.
